FuncDef: The reset ipv6 neighbors command clears dynamic IPv6 ND entries.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears dynamic ND entries on all interfaces.
-

Clears all dynamic ND entries on a specified interface.
-

Clears dynamic ND entries on a specified interface.
-

Clears dynamic ND entries of a specified VLAN ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If the number of dynamic ND entries exceeds the upper threshold, run the reset ipv6 neighbors command to delete unwanted dynamic ND entries.
Configuration Impact
Running the reset ipv6 neighbors command clears specified dynamic ND entries. Exercise caution when running this command.
